verses.verse: And <WG2532> he began <WG756> <WG5662> to speak <WG3004> <WG5721> unto them <WG846> by <WG1722> parables <WG3850>. A certain man <WG444> planted <WG5452> <WG5656> a vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> set <WG4060> <WG5656> an hedge about <WG5418> it, and <WG2532> digged <WG3736> <WG5656> a place for the winefat <WG5276>, and <WG2532> built <WG3618> <WG5656> a tower <WG4444>, and <WG2532> let <WG1554> it <WG846> out <WG1554> <WG5639> to husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> went into a far country <WG589> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> at the season <WG2540> he sent <WG649> <WG5656> to <WG4314> the husbandmen <WG1092> a servant <WG1401>, that <WG2443> he might receive <WG2983> <WG5632> from <WG3844> the husbandmen <WG1092> of <WG575> the fruit <WG2590> of the vineyard <WG290>.
And <WG1161> they caught <WG2983> <WG5631> him, and beat <WG1194> <WG5656> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> sent him away <WG649> <WG5656> empty <WG2756>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he sent <WG649> <WG5656> unto <WG4314> them <WG846> another <WG243> servant <WG1401>; and at him <WG2548> they cast stones <WG3036> <WG5660>, and wounded him in the head <WG2775> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> sent him away <WG649> <WG5656> shamefully handled <WG821> <WG5772>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he sent <WG649> <WG5656> another <WG243>; and him <WG2548> they killed <WG615> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> many <WG4183> others <WG243>; <WG3303> beating some <WG1194> <WG5723>, and <WG1161> killing some <WG615> <WG5723>.

Having <WG2192> <WG5723> yet <WG2089> therefore <WG3767> one <WG1520> son <WG5207>, his <WG846> wellbeloved <WG27>, he sent <WG649> <WG5656> him <WG846> also <WG2532> last <WG2078> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> They will reverence <WG1788> <WG5691> my <WG3450> son <WG5207>.

But <WG1161> those <WG1565> husbandmen <WG1092> said <WG2036> <WG5627> among <WG4314> themselves <WG1438>, This <WG3754> <WG3778> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the heir <WG2818>; come <WG1205> <WG5773>, let us kill <WG615> <WG5725> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> the inheritance <WG2817> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> ours <WG2257>.
And <WG2532> they took <WG2983> <WG5631> him <WG846>, and killed <WG615> <WG5656> him, and <WG2532> cast <WG1544> <WG5627> him out of <WG1854> the vineyard <WG290>.

What <WG5101> shall <WG4160> therefore <WG3767> the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> do <WG4160> <WG5692>? he will come <WG2064> <WG5695> and <WG2532> destroy <WG622> <WG5692> the husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> will give <WG1325> <WG5692> the vineyard <WG290> unto others <WG243>.

And have ye <WG314> not <WG3761> read <WG314> <WG5627> this <WG5026> scripture <WG1124>; The stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> <WG5723> rejected <WG593> <WG5656> is <WG3778> <WG1096> <WG5675> become <WG1519> the head <WG2776> of the corner <WG1137>:
This <WG3778> was <WG1096> the YY's <WG2962> doing <WG1096> <WG5633> <WG3844>, and <WG2532> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> marvellous <WG2298> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788>?

And <WG2532> they sought <WG2212> <WG5707> to lay hold <WG2902> <WG5658> on him <WG846>, but <WG2532> feared <WG5399> <WG5675> the people <WG3793>: for <WG1063> they knew <WG1097> <WG5627> that <WG3754> he had spoken <WG2036> <WG5627> the parable <WG3850> against <WG4314> them <WG846>: and <WG2532> they left <WG863> <WG5631> him <WG846>, and went their way <WG565> <WG5627>.

And <WG2532> they send <WG649> <WG5719> unto <WG4314> him <WG846> certain <WG5100> of the P'rushim <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the Herodians <WG2265>, to <WG2443> catch <WG64> <WG5661> him <WG846> in his words <WG3056>.

And <WG1161> when they were come <WG2064> <WG5631>, they say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, we know <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> true <WG227>, and <WG2532> <WG4671> carest <WG3756> <WG3199> <WG5719> for <WG4012> no man <WG3762>: for <WG1063> thou regardest <WG991> <WG5719> not <WG3756> the person <WG1519> <WG4383> of men <WG444>, but <WG235> teachest <WG1321> <WG5719> the way <WG3598> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1909> truth <WG225>: Is it Torahful <WG1832> <WG5748> to give <WG1325> <WG5629> tribute <WG2778> to Caesar <WG2541>, or <WG2228> not <WG3756>?

Shall we give <WG1325> <WG5632>, or <WG2228> shall we not <WG3361> give <WG1325> <WG5632>? But <WG1161> he, knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> their <WG846> hypocrisy <WG5272>, said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> tempt ye <WG3985> <WG5719> me <WG3165>? bring <WG5342> <WG5720> me <WG3427> a penny <WG1220>, that <WG2443> I may see <WG1492> <WG5632> it.

And <WG1161> they brought <WG5342> <WG5656> it. And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Whose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923>? And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Caesar's <WG2541>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answering <WG611> <WG5679> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Render <WG591> <WG5628> to Caesar <WG2541> the things that are <WG3588> Caesar's <WG2541>, and <WG2532> to 'Elohim <WG2316> the things that are <WG3588> 'Elohim's <WG2316>. And <WG2532> they marvelled <WG2296> <WG5656> at <WG1909> him <WG846>.

Then <WG2532> come <WG2064> <WG5736> unto <WG4314> him <WG846> the TZ'dukim <WG4523>, which <WG3748> say <WG3004> <WG5719> there is <WG1511> <WG5750> no <WG3361> resurrection <WG386>; and <WG2532> they asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

Master <WG1320>, Mosheh <WG3475> wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> unto us <WG2254>, If <WG3754> <WG1437> a man's <WG5100> brother <WG80> die <WG599> <WG5632>, and <WG2532> leave <WG2641> <WG5632> his wife <WG1135> behind him, and <WG2532> leave <WG863> <WG5632> no <WG3361> children <WG5043>, that <WG2443> his <WG846> brother <WG80> should take <WG2983> <WG5632> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> raise up <WG1817> <WG5661> seed <WG4690> unto his <WG846> brother <WG80>.

Now there were <WG2258> <WG5713> seven <WG2033> brethren <WG80>: and <WG2532> the first <WG4413> took <WG2983> <WG5627> a wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> dying <WG599> <WG5723> left <WG863> <WG5656> no <WG3756> seed <WG4690>.

And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> took <WG2983> <WG5627> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> died <WG599> <WG5627>, <WG2532> neither <WG3761> left <WG863> <WG5656> he <WG846> any seed <WG4690>: and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> likewise <WG5615>.

And <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> had <WG2983> <WG5627> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> left <WG863> <WG5656> no <WG3756> seed <WG4690>: last <WG2078> of all <WG3956> the woman <WG1135> died <WG599> <WG5627> also <WG2532>.

In <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> therefore <WG3767>, when <WG3752> they shall rise <WG450> <WG5632>, whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> shall she be <WG2071> <WG5704> of them <WG846>? for <WG1063> the seven <WG2033> had <WG2192> <WG5627> her <WG846> to wife <WG1135>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answering <WG611> <WG5679> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Do ye <WG4105> not <WG3756> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> err <WG4105> <WG5743>, because ye know <WG1492> <WG5761> not <WG3361> the scriptures <WG1124>, neither <WG3366> the power <WG1411> of 'Elohim <WG2316>?

For <WG1063> when <WG3752> they shall rise <WG450> <WG5632> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, they neither <WG3777> marry <WG1060> <WG5719>, nor <WG3777> are given in marriage <WG1061> <WG5743>; but <WG235> are <WG1526> <WG5748> as <WG5613> the angels <WG32> which <WG3588> are in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG1161> as touching <WG4012> the dead <WG3498>, that <WG3754> they rise <WG1453> <WG5743>: have ye <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> <WG5627> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of Mosheh <WG3475>, how <WG5613> in <WG1909> the bush <WG942> 'Elohim <WG2316> spake <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, I <WG1473> am the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Avraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Yitz'chak <WG2464>, and <WG2532> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Ya`akov <WG2384>?

He is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of the dead <WG3498>, but <WG235> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of the living <WG2198> <WG5723>: ye <WG5210> therefore <WG3767> do <WG4105> greatly <WG4183> err <WG4105> <WG5743>.

And <WG2532> one <WG1520> of the scribes <WG1122> came <WG4334> <WG5631>, and having heard <WG191> <WG5660> them <WG846> reasoning together <WG4802> <WG5723>, and perceiving <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> he had answered <WG611> <WG5662> them <WG846> well <WG2573>, asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846>, Which <WG4169> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the first <WG4413> Mitzvah <WG1785> of all <WG3956>?

And <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662> him <WG846>, The <WG3754> first <WG4413> of all <WG3956> the Mitzvot <WG1785> is, Hear <WG191> <WG5720>, O Yisra'EL <WG2474>; The YY <WG2962> our <WG2257> 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> one <WG1520> YY <WG2962>:

And <WG2532> thou shalt love <WG25> <WG5692> the YY <WG2962> thy <WG4675> 'Elohim <WG2316> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> mind <WG1271>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> strength <WG2479>: this <WG3778> is the first <WG4413> Mitzvah <WG1785>.

And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> is like <WG3664>, namely this <WG3778> <WG5625> <WG846>, Thou shalt love <WG25> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572>. There is <WG2076> <WG5748> none <WG3756> other <WG243> Mitzvah <WG1785> greater <WG3187> than these <WG5130>.

And <WG2532> the scribe <WG1122> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Well <WG2573>, Master <WG1320>, thou hast said <WG2036> <WG5627> the <WG1909> truth <WG225>: for <WG3754> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> one <WG1520> 'Elohim <WG2316>; and <WG2532> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> none <WG3756> other <WG243> but <WG4133> he <WG846>:

And <WG2532> to love <WG25> <WG5721> him <WG846> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the understanding <WG4907>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the strength <WG2479>, and <WG2532> to love <WG25> <WG5721> his neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> himself <WG1438>, is <WG2076> <WG5748> more <WG4119> than all <WG3956> whole burnt offerings <WG3646> and <WG2532> sacrifices <WG2378>.

And <WG2532> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> that <WG3754> he <WG846> answered <WG611> <WG5662> discreetly <WG3562>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> not <WG3756> far <WG3112> from <WG575> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316>. And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> after that <WG3765> durst <WG5111> <WG5707> ask <WG1905> <WG5658> him <WG846> any question.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG3004> <WG5707>, while he taught <WG1321> <WG5723> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, How <WG4459> say <WG3004> <WG5719> the scribes <WG1122> that <WG3754> Moshiach <WG5547> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>?

For <WG1063> David <WG1138> himself <WG846> said <WG2036> <WG5627> by <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, The YY <WG2962> said <WG2036> <WG5627> to my <WG3450> YY <WG2962>, Sit thou <WG2521> <WG5737> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, till <WG2193> <WG302> I make <WG5087> <WG5632> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> thy <WG4675> footstool <WG5286> <WG4228>.

David <WG1138> therefore <WG3767> himself <WG846> calleth <WG3004> <WG5719> him <WG846> YY <WG2962>; and <WG2532> whence <WG4159> is he <WG2076> <WG5748> then his <WG846> son <WG5207>? And <WG2532> the common <WG4183> people <WG3793> heard <WG191> <WG5707> him <WG846> gladly <WG2234>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto them <WG846> in <WG1722> his <WG846> doctrine <WG1322>, Beware <WG991> <WG5720> of <WG575> the scribes <WG1122>, which <WG3588> love <WG2309> <WG5723> to go <WG4043> <WG5721> in <WG1722> long clothing <WG4749>, and <WG2532> love salutations <WG783> in <WG1722> the marketplaces <WG58>,
And <WG2532> the chief seats <WG4410> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> the uppermost rooms <WG4411> at <WG1722> feasts <WG1173>:

Which devour <WG2719> <WG5723> widows <WG5503>' houses <WG3614>, and <WG2532> for a pretence <WG4392> make <WG4336> long <WG3117> prayers <WG4336> <WG5740>: these <WG3778> shall receive <WG2983> <WG5695> greater <WG4055> damnation <WG2917>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> sat <WG2523> <WG5660> over against <WG2713> the treasury <WG1049>, and beheld <WG2334> <WG5707> how <WG4459> the people <WG3793> cast <WG906> <WG5719> money <WG5475> into <WG1519> the treasury <WG1049>: and <WG2532> many <WG4183> that were rich <WG4145> cast in <WG906> <WG5707> much <WG4183>.
And <WG2532> there came <WG2064> <WG5631> a certain <WG3391> poor <WG4434> widow <WG5503>, and she threw in <WG906> <WG5627> two <WG1417> mites <WG3016>, which make <WG3603> a farthing <WG2835>.

And <WG2532> he called <WG4341> <WG5666> unto him his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, and saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> this <WG3778> poor <WG4434> widow <WG5503> hath cast <WG906> more <WG4119> in <WG906> <WG5758>, than all <WG3956> they which have cast <WG906> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the treasury <WG1049>:

For <WG1063> all <WG3956> they did cast in <WG906> <WG5627> of <WG1537> their <WG846> abundance <WG4052> <WG5723>; but <WG1161> she <WG3778> <WG5625> <WG846> of <WG1537> her <WG846> want <WG5304> did cast in <WG906> <WG5627> all <WG3956> that <WG3745> she had <WG2192> <WG5707>, even all <WG3650> her <WG846> living <WG979>.
